reviews.review: Really enjoyable. Puzzles get difficult, but not so difficult it makes me want to quit. A good brain bender and great game overall.

Very good atmosphere.
Single player is a bit easy and short.
Very good Co-Op mode, due to so many good custom-made maps.

Very much like the last game...until you blow open the back of the game and go through a much, muuuuuch longer awesomness of portals and new game mechanics!  And make sure to keep the volume up, because the dialogue is still worth catching.
Отличная игра, всем брать) must have
Game has a great continued story line from the first game. Same great mechanics, same great comedy. All in All a great game that is definitely worth playing
Excelente !!!
Amazing game, spent hundrets of hours playing the community created maps after finishing the single player and the coop missions campain.

Absolutely love this game. The Co-Op was insanely fun. It has awesome puzzles... that can stump you. You can create your own rooms and play through the community - which some are just crazy lol So much love for this game.
SPAAAAAAACE
I like it.
재밌습니다! 명불허전.

Loved this game. Great story line, less puzzle focus, but still great puzzles.

I did tend to get a bit motion sick from this one though. Couldn't play for more than an hour.
GOOD
One of the best games from valve i expect a 3 please lol *never gonna happen*
muito gudiii
Unreal Co-op mode!
Richtig geiles Spiel. Es hat eine sehr gute Grafik und macht sehr viel spass :D auf jedenfall zu empfehlen

Does anyone out there still not know that this is one of the greatest games of the recent gaming generation?  It adapts the tired FPS genre by adding challenging (not frustrating) puzzles and leaves the bullet spraying Rambo gameplay out.  It combines that intelligent gameplay with a brilliantly conceived world of which details are revealed to you in an amazing feat of (linear) interactive storytelling.  Also it is funny - REALLY FUNNY.  You MUST play this game.
I love the co-op!

While the single player mode of Portal 2 isn't as witty as that of the first Portal game, the new mechanisms you have to use to solve levels keep things interesting. Portal 2's most important change though, is the coop mode and the community chambers. These two ensure that you have a virtually endless source of entertainment to enjoy with a friend.

What a sequel! I only got into the Portal games after seeing Portal 2 trailers on the TV, then playing through Portal. This is such a fantastic game - it incorporates all the stuff from Portal with a quick tutorial at the beginning, and a brilliant storyline with interesting twists and turns. Some bits are a bit confusing, and whilst navigating I sometimes lost my bearings, but after the 3rd playthrough it was fine :) Highly recommended!

If you like violating the laws of space, robots with comedic value, a great storyline and puzzles, then this game is for you. Oh, and if you're bored and shooting other people into bits is not enough, then this can help you.
Masterpiece. Buy this and Portal 1. It's worth your money trust me.
Portal 2 is an excellent game. Definitely get it.

[h1]            ♡[/h1]

Ah Portal, how could I not have written a review about you. Portal, my dearest love. With your bipolar, futuristic, life-threatening sweetheart as a military-degree-intruder-eliminating turret. Your nipple-tingling love-heart iconic socially interactive cube. And character-enriched colourfully cooperative genetic life-like cores.

I'd pass a dimension, even if it'd shatter my skeleton, I'd walk on radioactive-looking plasma force field for a platform, I'd embed my sleeve into an aperture science apparatus, I'd bounce on your gravity-deceiving faith plate, I'd bathe in propulsion gel.
[i]GLaDOS[/i], I'd be your test subject any day.

[h1]            ♡[/h1]
Its like portal 1 except that its portal 2.
One of the best games evar!
This game is just awesome, I can't even say it in words, and the co-op is for sure a great way to expend the day with that friend.

Sir/madam you liked portal you're gonna like this. but really it is a step up from portal one the games is good fun and challenging at the sametime and the comical continuity thought out the game encorages you to find out what happens at the end.
Świetna gra logiczna. Najlepiej się gra z przyjacielem, dobre do gry z dziewczyną ;) Polecam
really good

The cake is a lie. If you haven't played this yet, you should!

I also like the fact that the game has a really well done co-op campaign.
An incredible game worth many playthroughs.
Gud gam.
剧情很饱满，尤其在玩过双人模式之后，期待下一作。
A-freakin-mazing game....superb in every aspect....buy NOW
First game, that if've played the Singleplayer Story more then once
Игра класс. И правда надо подумать!!!

Muy recomendado :D

Um Jogo Otimo Com uma historia Otima e o Co-op e mais ingraçado porque geralmente seu amigo nao sabe fazer as coisas
Feelings <3
Very good and one-of-a-kind fps puzzle platformer. buy it you won't regret it.
Игра развивает логику. Но это не работает если вы её проходили =). Можно создавать свои уровни. Одним словом: КЛАСС
Amazing game - played it straight through when it first came out.  It's one of those rare games that you just HAVE to play!
Uno dei piu bei giochi di sempre!
!Jogo perfeito, um dos melhores puzzles já feitos até hoje!

This game is as good as the original if not better. There are new elements so the experience doesn't feel like just like Portal DLC. This game gives you multiplayer which I really liked. And it gives you more than double the playing time Portal gave. All in All I would say if you liked Portal 1 you'll love this.

Best game ever! Way longer than Portal 1, which is very nice, the test chambers are amazing, they really put you to think, and once again you are being monitored by a psycho robot who tries to discourage your every move. The co-op part of it is great, different storyline than the single player, you really need to be a team to complete a test chamber.

20/10

Un incontournable de votre ludothèque.
Une suite révé du premier épisode.

En esperant qu'un jour il y ait une suite
Ottimo gioco rompicapo. Consiglio!
第一部玩过之后就有很深的印象，第二部感觉更赞，非常值得玩的游戏

Es un juegaso, todo total mente diferente a lo que estaba acostumbrado, y solo hay que tener cerbro para saverlo jeje, ademas puedes jugar coperatibo con la gente de play station 3 sin falla alguna es la onda este juego recomedado al 100%
g

Single player campaign is very entertaining, unfortunately very linear.
Multiplayer campaign is also great.

But the best part is probably the (almost) endless amount of user generated levels that you can play alone or together.
Portal 2 is one of the things I hope future archeaologists unearth amidst the ruins of civilization.
Um dos melhores jogos que eu ja joguei.
Очень клёвая игра!!!!
Viva portal 2, gioco epico sopratutto dal punto della logica, ha una grafica abbastanza buona per il tipo di gioco. CONSIGLIATO
Un très bon jeu rempli d'humour, mais sans oublier le gameplay, les énigmes et surtout l'ambiance. A ne pas manquer!

Erst eine Stunde gespielt und schon süchtig. Nach dem ersten Teil eine wirklich gelungene Fortsetzung.
Alleine schon der britische Akzent, mit dem man begrüßt wird, lohnt den kauf. Auch die Atmosphäre ist super.

세일이라서 해봤는데 전편보다 정말 재밌고 지금 현시점으로 한게 매우 아쉽지만 엔딩보고 매우 만족! 
쉬워 보이는 구간은 어럽게. 어려워보이는 구간은 간단하게 해결..하면서 잘 안되는구간을 1시간동안 쩔쩔매었는데 
공략을 보고 했더니 괜히 어렵게 풀어갈려고만 했던 나를 보았고 벨브한테 낚긴듯한 더러운기분. 
하지만 두번은 안낚였고 덕분에 머리가 쫄깃해짐. 이제 더 재밌다는 멀티 ㄱㄱㄱ하러
말이 필요한가? 명작이다
퍼즐게임의 진수를 보여준다. 너무 복잡하지도 그렇다고 퍼즐을 푸느라 잊어버릴 액션적인 요소가 없는 것도 아니다. 퍼즐게임 좋아하는 사람은 해보길 바란다. 생각하면서 즐거울 것이다.
bisognerebbe giocare a questo gioco solo per la scena finale del single player

good game
this game is awesome and i reccomend to buy it worth the money and you will  enjoy it very much :)

This game finally brings something new. Takes the good old puzzle games to a next level by using a simple but amazing idea of the portals and let you explore the tons of possibilities. The second episode gives you a fantastic storyline with well designed characters.
Many portals, much thinking, such dialogue.
this is actually one of the most addictive brain testing games i have ever played

Très bon jeu,
Si vous l'avez aimer, essayer antichamber, un puzzle game d'un tout autre genre

12/10

Theres nothing to say about it
The first one is better but this is still cool.
Ritka az ilyen játék, ami ennyire le tud kötni! Nagyon ajánlom!

i dont even nkow what too say its so so so addicting can be boring at times of too long but those snanps of suprize

Viele neue Ideen im Vergleich zum Vorgänger und eine sehr viel längere Spieldauer mit Langzeitmotivation. Wenn dann der Steam-Workshop noch mit neuen Testkammern dazu kommt... Unendliche Möglichkeiten, nicht nur um eine Ecke zu denken.

Je n'ai jamais joué au premier, mais je connaisais plus ou moins l'histoire. La suite est géniale, bon scénario, musiques agréables, personnages attachants et evidemment excellent Gameplay ! Je recommmande
一款打破常规的FPS动作游戏，继续1代的经典，宏大深邃的场景让人觉得有几分神秘和恐怖。游戏玩法很有新意，让你意想不到的想象力和空间思维能力，难度相比1代有所降低
Geniales Spiel, das man nicht verpassen sollte.
Потрясающая игра, способствующая развивитию пространственного мышления! И что очень важно, ее можно запустить на Ubuntu!
Hammergeil!!!

A very great game, puzzling at times. Also, the achievements make you want to go back and collect them! Like breaking Wheatley's screen, which was difficult. Also, you can make community test chambers, which is a plus, like creating your own portal test chamber! It's quite fun if you play with your friends, especially if you create difficult test chambers, as you can watch them rage. I recommend this game, and since it is a Summer sale, I recommend you to buy it.
Did not work on my Xbaxstation U. But now it works on my windowtoshlinux.

Как произведение искусства, похожа на композиции великих классиков - они гениальны и вечны.
Очень хорошо проработана со всех сторон, главная линия сюжета, различные отсылки. Музыка очень важна в данной игре, создает атмосферу, погружает в игру. Конечно же графика тоже имеет ключевую роль и она отличная, движок valve очередной раз показывает чудеса оптимизации и очень приятную для глаз картинку. Сетевой режим смешной и интересный. Прошел на одном дыхании 2-ой раз)
If you haven't played this game yet, you should buy it and play it immediately. Seriously.
Наверное одна из немногих игр, которая заставляет работать мозги. Все удобно и просто)

Bardzo dobra gra za bardzo niskie pieniądze. Rozwija ciekawa koncepcję jedynki w dobry sposób dodając wiele nowych elementów jak choćby mosty świetlne. Co-op w tej grze to totalne mistrzostwo, idealne połączenie ciekawych zagadek ,śmiechu i wygłupów dają naprawdę genialny efekt. Polecam tą grę każdemu kto lubi porozwiązywać zagadki logiczne , zarówno samemu jak i z towarzyszem.
非常适合和朋友一起玩！
cool game, would buy 10/10
Starts easy but gets SUPER hard.  Robot from first game comes back.  I dig it!

YA GOTTA PLAY THIS GAME! Portal 2, and it's predecessor, Portal, are both awesome games. YOU GOTTA PLAY ONE OF EM AT LEAST! I prefer Portal 2, because of it's awesome storyline, amazingly done graphics, and overall gameplay. This game is sweet. Good job Gaben, good job.
Одна из самых любимых игр.
非常考验智商的一款游戏,花了几个小时和朋友@halahaisawesome把多人通了感觉值了,单人关卡无论是从剧情还是难度都很赞,值得一买
A game that everyone should try. It takes you to.... whole.... nother..... level.
